COOPERATES_WITH.description: When two actors work together towards common goals.

SUPPORTS.description: When an actor provides support, aid, or backing to another actor or concept.

PROMOTES.description: When an actor promotes or advances a concept or value.

THREATENS.description: When an actor or threat endangers another actor or concept.

ENSURES.description: When an actor guarantees or safeguards a concept or value.

JOINS.description: When an actor joins another group or alliance.

COUNTERS.description: When an actor responds to or opposes a threat or actor.
